We're shaping the New Procurement.

Join Us!

Over a decade ago, we started VendorPanel to make it fairer and easier for organisations and their suppliers to do business. Since then, the platform has helped clients to simplify and control decentralised spend, to reduce risk, to save money and to leverage procurement spend for positive outcomes. Now, as we grow our international business and increase investment in product, technology and service, we're helping to shape the New Procurement - no longer just an administrative function but a key business enabler.


James Leathem, CEO

James Leathem

Founder & CEO


James drives strategy and growth, with a background in procurement consulting and leadership development.
